name: The Junie Scarf - Original - Trio Collection (0 to 4T)
description:
Handmade in the Mountain West, USA

Each scarf is sold separately and is made for kiddies ages 0mo to 4T.

The Junie Scarf Original Trio Collection features my picks - mint, golden rod and speckled cream colors. This cowl design makes the scarf shorter and simpler but extremely warm. They are lighter and thinner than the junie scarf chunky. The acrylic yarn is soft and non-irritable, perfect for the little ones to keep them warm in cold weather during their winter activities. They also complete super adorable toddler outfits and help to prevent colds and runny noses (not proven but hopeful!)

Each scarf is made from 100% medium weight acrylic yarn

Hand washing is recommended for maintaining quality then laid flat to dry. 

Each item in my shop is hand made when ordered. Please allow at least 14 to 18 business days for your scarves to be made & ready to ship. There is an $8 rush fee if you need your scarves sooner plus expedited shipping costs if necessary. 

Thank you!

name: The Junie Scarf - Chunky (0 mo to 4T)
description:
Handmade in the Mountain West, USA

The Junie Scarf Chunky cowl design makes the scarf shorter and simpler but extremely warm. The acrylic yarn is thicker than the junie scarf original but still extremely soft and non-irritable, perfect for cold weather and winter activities.

Each scarf is made from 75% acrylic and 25% wool yarn.

Hand washing is recommended for maintaining quality then laid flat to dry. 

Each item in my shop is hand made when ordered. Please allow at least 14 to 18 business days for your scarves to be made & ready to ship.

Thank you!

name: The Junie Scarf - Grown Up (Chunky)
description:
Handmade in the Mountain West, USA

The Junie Scarf Grown Up are scarves for the grown ups! This cowl design makes the scarf shorter and simpler but extremely warm. The acrylic yarn is thick, extremely soft and non-irritable, perfect for cold weather and winter activities. Did I mention, they are gender neutral? Makes life so much easier.

Each scarf is made from 75% acrylic and 25% wool yarn.

Hand washing is recommended for maintaining quality then laid flat to dry. 

Each item in my shop is hand made when ordered. Please allow at least 14 to 18 business days for your scarves to be made & ready to ship.

Thank you!

name: The Junie Scarf - December - The Cranberries
description:
Each month we select a couple of unique colors and styles at limited time only. 

December's Colors are: Dark Cranberry for the Junie scarf original style (kids only) and (merry &) bright cranberry (for the chunky kid and adult style). 

Last day to order is Tuesday, December 31st. 

If you are ordering for Christmas, you have to order by December 4th!
